components.name: 1-hexyl-3-methylimidazolium bis[(trifluoromethyl)sulfonyl]imide
sample: 0.005 water mass %;0.01 halide impurity mass %(dried by vacuum heating)

title: Phase transition properties: Normal melting temperature

ref.full: Gomez, E.; Calvar, N.; Dominguez, A.; Macedo, E. A. (2013) Ind. Eng. Chem. Res. 52, 2103-2110.
ref.title: Thermal Analysis and Heat Capacities of 1-Alkyl-3-methylimidazolium Ionic Liquids with NTf2-, TFO-, and DCA- Anions
